title: Hundreds of Cards for Sale: Summer Discount
author: chris

posts.post_title: Hundreds of Cards for Sale: Summer Discount
posts.post_content:
I am offering a 15% off (Summer discount) plus free shipping on anything in my Ebay store for Net54 users. The offer is valid for all "buy it now" items in my Ebay store until May 20th, midnight est.. Please send all requests to [url]bucklercards@yahoo.com[/url] or reply to this thread, please do not purchase the cards through Ebay as it will charge me more in fees. I will ship for FREE. I accept Paypal, Money Orders and Personal Checks.

Here is a link to my store.
[url]http://shop.ebay.com/somersetvelvet/m.html?_nkw=&_armrs=1&_from=&_ipg=25[/url]

Have a safe, fun summer.

Thanks, Chris :)

Bump.. Feel free to email any questions to [url]bucklercards@yahoo.com[/url]

Thanks :)
